price: جگە لەوانەی کە بڕوایان ھێناوە وکردەوە چاکەکانیان کردووە، بۆ ئەوان ھەیە پاداشتی نەبڕاوە
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti falahum ajrun ghayru mamnūnin
